Text:
I do not value your opinion. You simply read my description and shoot it down on the spot. Judging the quality of a recording without taking a listen would be like judging a book simply based on it's cover.

If you want to listen and then give your opinion based on your listening experience I am all ears. Until then I care about nothing you have to say.

BTW, the 2004 remaster of this album has a DR6. Are you accusing Dave Mustaine of ruining a classic as well?
